snippet: Programs that accelerate customs and security screening are catching on with travelers. But are they right for you? Here are answers to some common questions.
abstract: Stephanie Rosenbloom The Getaway column on Trusted Traveler programs, approved by Customs and Border Protection, that expedite passenger screening and customs declaration processes for fliers willing to undergo a background check and pay a fee; many travelers and public interest groups have expressed concerns about the effectiveness of the programs and their potential impact on civil liberties.
lead_paragraph: Programs that accelerate customs and security screening are catching on with travelers. But are they right for you? Here are answers to some common questions.

headline.seo: Speedy Airport Security: Should You Apply?
headline.main: Speedy Airport Security: Should You Apply?
